channel.title: Mysql on Tim Trice
channel.description: Recent content in Mysql on Tim Trice

item.title: Basic Aggregation with MySQL
item.description: Maximum Wind Minimum Pressure Count Cyclones per Year Average Wind Standard Deviation Sample Standard Deviation Variance Sample Variance Maximum Wind SELECT `Key`, MAX(`Wind`) AS MaxWind FROM `adv` GROUP BY `Key` ORDER BY `MaxWind` DESC LIMIT 0, 10; Table 1: 10 records Key MaxWind EP202015 175 AL131998 155 EP202009 155 AL122005 150 AL182005 150 AL242005 150 EP142002 145 AL092004 145 AL042007 145 AL062007 145 Minimum Pressure SELECT `Key`, MIN(`Pressure`) AS MinPress FROM `adv` GROUP BY `Key` ORDER BY `MinPress` LIMIT 0, 10; Table 2: 10 records Key MinPress EP202015 880 AL242005 882 AL182005 897 AL122005 902 AL131998 906 AL042007 906 EP202009 906 AL092004 910 EP142002 915 EP132014 918 Count Cyclones per Year SELECT YEAR(`Date`) AS `Yr`, COUNT(DISTINCT(`Key`)) AS `n` FROM `adv` GROUP BY YEAR(`Date`) ORDER BY `n` DESC LIMIT 0, 10; Table 3: 10 records Yr n 2005 46 2016 38 2000 37 2003 37 2012 36 2008 35 2015 34 2001 34 2010 33 2004 32 Average Wind SELECT `Key`, AVG(`Wind`) AS `AvgWind` FROM `adv` GROUP BY `Key` ORDER BY `AvgWind` DESC LIMIT 0, 10; Table 4: 10 records Key AvgWind AL132003 102.
